original: Björklund, Bror Erhard, major, Uddevalla, f. 21/2/94 i Vänersborg av jägmäst. Erhard B. o. Ida Milto-pæus. G. 17 m. Greta Engeström. Barn: Astrid f. 19, g. 43 m. dir. Gösta Sandels, Sthlm, Carl-Fredrik 21, jur. stud. — Stud:ex. i Vänersborg 13, off:ex. 16, RS 24-25, SS 26. Fänrik v. Västg. reg. 16, löjtn. 18, v. Bohusl. reg. 28, kapt. där 31 o. major 40. Re-petitör v. kspkurs. 27-28, andre lär. v. SS 35-37. RSO, 2 skytteM.
translated: Björklund, Bror Erhard, Major, Uddevalla, born February 21, 1894 in Vänersborg to a forester, Erhard B. and Ida Milto-pæus. Married in 1917 to Greta Engeström. Children: Astrid (born in 1919) married in 1943 to director Gösta Sandels in Stockholm and Carl-Fredrik (born in 1921) who studied law. He graduated from high school in Vänersborg in 1913, officer training in 1916, served in the Royal Swedish Army from 1924-1925 and in 1928 became a lieutenant in Bohusläns Regiment, became captain there in 1931 and was promoted to major in 1940. From 1927-1928, he served as a tutor for military training and from 1935-1937 as a secondary teacher at SS (the military's college). He was awarded the RSO (Order of the Sword) and 2 marksman medals.
